Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Clippers played on the road and lost to the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night 126-103.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Tyronn Lue expressed support for Kawhi Leonard and his family, saying 'You definitely have to take care of home.... Totally had my support 100%.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ongoing wildfires in the L.A. area forced Kawhi Leonard to take a leave of absence from the team to be with his family.
Los Angeles Lakers head coach JJ Redick's family also evacuated their homes due to the wildfires.
Others: Kawhi Leonard is averaging 10 points in 20 minutes per game in his season debut against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday, January 4.
